ygData.subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you ... for ... never ... The Red and black seeker smiles softly at Beachcomber s comment. It takes him some effort, but he manages to reply.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber looks in with great fascination. "Whoa buddy, where are 
you
> from?" He asks, very interested with the insides. He looks around 
for
> something that looks like it may be damaged, or disconected. He was
> being careful though, he didn't want to mess with something he had 
never
> seen before.

    ::Redhot::

       The Red and black seeker smiles softly at Beachcomber's 
comment. It takes him some effort, but he manages to reply.
       "...Off...world...." he gasps. "Home..in Alpha..Cen
...centauri." 
       Redhot told partial truth. He WAS an offworlder and an Alpha 
Centaurian, but he was also a Transformer. He was born and raised on 
Cybertron... but in a way he felt the stranger would never
understand. 
He swallows hard, wishing he didn't have to be secretive. His eyes 
close, trying to rest.
       (OOC: His injuries are substantial. It looks like he's been 
mauled by something huge. His wings are pitted and knawed, and it 
looks like he had taken some lazerfire. His cockpit is cracked,
almost 
to the point of shattering. His lazerfire holes have melted edges. 
They appear to be the only thing keeping his cockpit together.
       Internally it looks like a lazer bolt has bounced around. A 
fuel line has been severed and Redhot is on the verge of bleeding to 
death. Other Systems are singed or burned. What appeared to be his 
...engine... took the most substantal injuries. As alien as it 
appears, it looks remotely 'familiar' and BC could possibly bluff his 
way around.)

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
******************************
